metadata.title: CVE-2023-0469 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in io_uring/filetable.c inio_install_fixed_file in the io_uring subcomponent in the Linux Kernelduring call cleanup. This flaw may lead to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
